startMessage:
Hello, this is *TeN Weather*.
A bot that provides the following real-time informations for your location:

â‘  Weather Information
Such as temperatures (current, maximum, minimum and feels like), wind speed, air humidity and weather alerts.

â‘¡ Astronomical Information [Coming Soon]
Such as sunrise and sunset times, moonrise and moonset times and the current phase of the moon.

Use /help to learn how to use commands.
addGroup: ğŸ’¬ Add me to your group
help_message:
*TeN Weather* is a bot for *real-time* weather and astronomical information for your location.

You can use it inline without adding it to channels or groups. Just type the bot's username and your city's name.

*Source Code:* [GitHub](https://github.com/leviobrabo/climatologiabot)

title_init: Enter the name of your city.
description_init: (If you can't find it, type it in the format: City, UK or US.)
msg_text_init:
You can use me inline, which means you don't have to add me to groups. Just enter my username and the name of your location.

For example: <code>@TeNClima_bot Tokyo</code >
